description:
Description
a panel of 181 observations  from 1983  to 1991
number of observations :  1629
observation :  production units
country :  world
title: Patents, R&D and Technological Spillovers for a Panel of Firms
reference: Cincer, Michele (1997) “Patents, R & D and technological spillovers at the firm level : some evidence from econometric count models for panel data”, Journal of Applied Econometrics, 12(3), May–June, 265–280.
